title: KALISTA IS THE MOST RIDICULOUS CHAMP EVER CREATED.
body: {{champion:429}} WHAT THE FUCK WERE YOU THINKING WHEN YOU DESIGNED THIS CHAMPION? ARE YOU ALL A BUNCH OF APES? SERIOUSLY EXPLAIN YOUR FUCKING LOGIC WITH THAT R%%%%%ED PASSIVE THAT HAS NO FUCKING COOLDOWN BESIDES HOW FAST OR SLOW THEIR ATTACK SPEED IS. YOU ARE A PATHETIC JOKE RIOT. PLEASE, DECLARE BANKRUPTCY AND DISBAND YOUR COMPANY YOU ARE PITIFUL.
